name: Jumper (Kyle Bignell)
description:
An infinite platformer built for the Future 200 line wonder game jam.

With just your trusty jetpack how long can you last as platforms whizz past at ever increasing speeds. Collect coins to increase your score and pick up fuel cans to increase your max fuel, you're going to need it! 

Controls KeyActionAMove leftDMove rightWJumpSpaceJetpack
